name: Cat Capacity
description:
Cats are forbidden in Rodentia, Baba disagrees. Developed by solo dev JT Mitchell.

By King Uberlort's decree, cats are now illegal in Rodentia. Help Baba hide her beloved cats before Uberlort's goons catch her harboring a hoard of feline fugitives. If Baba is caught Uberlort's goons will throw her in the dungeon with yesterday's tuna. A hectic Katamari-inspired platformer/crazy cat lady sim, where you run around stuffing cats in closets while trolling Uberlort's dim-witted goons.

-Move those chicken legs!
-Cats are forbidden, hide them as fast as you can.
-2 modes: Frantic time attack, and hide from the Bunnman.
-2 Evil NPC types that dynamically change the gameplay.
-5 cat types (Each does something different).
-18 progressively challenging levels (With more on the way).
-A dynamic point system/metagame.
-4 Easter eggs (With more on the way).
-Hi, medium and, low graphics settings for a wide variety of systems.
-Support Solo Dev JT Mitchell (Shameless plug).



CrAzY cat collecting action!!
